title: Can a Gaming PC Survive the North Pole? - Environmental Chamber Update

description: Get 69% off any of XSplits video tools. Use code LINUS at   Create your build at   Our new environmental testing chamber can reach temperatures in excess of 50 degrees Celsius, or as low at -40 - the only question that remains is can a gaming computer survive these extremes?  Discuss on the forum:   Buy an Intel Core i9-13900K CPU:  Buy an ASUS ROG Strix GeForce RTX 4090 OC GPU:  Buy a DeepCool Infinity Series LT520 240mm Liquid Cooler:  Check out the EKWB EK-Quantum Velocity Direct Die D-RGB 1700 Nickel + Plexi:   Check out the rig from OriginPC we used in this video:   Check out the SCH-512-4 Environmental Chamber here:   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.
